previewArticle.title: Portland Timbers vs. Chivas USA | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Portland Timbers 2, Chivas USA 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Chivas USA travel to Portland to take on the Timbers at Providence Park.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Portland Timbers vs Chivas USA

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Mychal Quintanilla
timelineItems.text: O'rourke on the right? o_O #RCTID

timelineItems.name: skywaker9
timelineItems.text: Valeri with the magic foot! #rctid

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 10' - GOOOOOOOLLLLLLLAAAAAAZO!!!!!! VALLLLLLLEEERRRRIII!!!!! His fourth in four games! Timbers lead 1-0!!!! #RCTID

timelineItems.desc: Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Tony Lochhead booked for a rough challenge

timelineItems.name: Jamie Goldberg
timelineItems.text: Valeri is now tied with Nagbe for most career goals in MLS Timbers history with 17 #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Joshua Duder
timelineItems.text: OMFG Valeri is GOD. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Eric Beard
timelineItems.text: 50 yard run. Cut on his right from 25 yards out. Curler into the back of the net. Bravo, Diego Valeri. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Matt Perreault
timelineItems.text: I think we may have finally unlocked Diego Valeri's final form... #RCTID

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top center of the goal.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Lochhead (Chivas USA).
Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Jeff Legaspi
timelineItems.text: Every match I've watched on #MLSLive today has just been inundated with goals. Valeri just added one more. #PORvCHV

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Oh my, Valeri. #PORvCHV http://t.co/78pW4RsJru

timelineItems.text: Timbers are playing inspired defense right now. Finally. It only took an All-Star game. #rctid

timelineItems.text: Lovely by La Gata finding the switch to Valeri. #RCTID #PORvCHV

timelineItems.text: When I saw Zavaletta backing up I thought for sure Valeri would be getting a brace. #PORvCHV

timelineItems.name: Derek Tritsch
timelineItems.text: Very much liking the Paparatto - Ridgewell pairing. Both look sharp. Calming influence #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Geoffrey C. Arnold
timelineItems.text: Chivas performing as if they really don't want to be here. #rctid

timelineItems.name: Chris Gluck
timelineItems.text: #PORvCHV #RCTID chivas pressing hi - already their defending pattern is different from last game - wonder how long it lasts?

timelineItems.text: 2' Early tackles in the match. Clear both teams desperately want a win. And Valeri is through but offside and correctly ruled. #PORvCHV

timelineItems.text: ROD WALL BABY!!!!! #RCTID

timelineItems.name: BOG
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOAAAAAALLLLLLLL! The One True Rod is back. Adi with the exemplification of a hold up and Wallace to bang it home. 2-0. #RCTID #PORvCHV

timelineItems.name: Michelangelo TMNT
timelineItems.text: GOOOOL DE WALLACE !! 2-0 #RCTID

timelineItems.text: 40th minute: Two goals for Timbers, not one shot for Chivas. #PORvCHV

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Complete failure to clear the lines there. Set up by Chara's cheeky flip. Adi is just a wrecking ball. #PORvCHV

timelineItems.name: Paul Danzer
timelineItems.text: Great to see Adi use his strength there and show composure with back to goal to flick ball to Wallace. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer

timelineItems.text: Man I gotta go to Timbers matches more often. #rctid http://t.co/FUAg9UW7Ae

timelineItems.name: Timber/Gunner
timelineItems.text: How much more confident WJ and Chara are in the back line? You can see by how far up they have been, no fear getting forward. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Derek Tritsch
timelineItems.text: Porter REALLY got it right with the lineup tonight. This is the best I've seen La Gata all year. He's freelancing all over the pitch #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Porter said last week you can't try to ride the game out for 70 minutes up 1-0, you got to keep playing. Lesson learned. #porvchv

timelineItems.name: JaviER
timelineItems.text: #ChivasUSA 2014, No more Vergara, no more 2nd Division CHIVAS MX players and still same results, still in last place..so who's to blame now.

timelineItems.name: Geoffrey C. Arnold
timelineItems.text: That's about as good a first half as the Timbers have played this season. dominant possession, attacking, goals and good defense. #rctid

timelineItems.name: Ben
timelineItems.text: What a half! #RCTID http://t.co/651NQBPwPl

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Halftime's a good time to look to the east and take in the #supermoon. #RCTID http://t.co/pTJrR7Dd91

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Evans
timelineItems.text: #RCTID  best half def pressure/win ball back this year..secret ingredient to 2013 Timbers success was winning ball back in mid and opp half

timelineItems.name: BOG
timelineItems.text: Adi did his laundry, made his bed, laid down to take a nap, and still made coffee before laying that ball off to Rodney. #RCTID #PORvCHV

timelineItems.name: Daniel Riley
timelineItems.text: @TimbersFC paparatto playing outstanding tonight! #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Dangerous play by Marco Delgado (Chivas USA).
Will Johnson (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Fanendo Adi (Portland Timbers) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Rodney Wallace with a cross.
Foul by Norberto Paparatto (Portland Timbers).
Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Danny O'Rourke.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Rodney Wallace (Portland Timbers) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Dan Kennedy parries Wallace's blast

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Dan Kennedy.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Tonight's attendance: 20,814. 63rd straight sellout. Thank you fans! #RCTID #SoccerCityUSA

timelineItems.name: Peter Bromka
timelineItems.text: If all players played as hard as Will Johnson the world would explode and implode simultaneously. Too much energy. #RCTID @TimbersFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Rodney Wallace (Portland Timbers) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Diego Valeri.
Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Erick Torres.
Attempt missed. Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Diego Chara (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Rosales was brought to improve a putrid Chivas set-piece game. Team scored off a corner in week one, but they've been scarce since #porvchv

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Nathan Sturgis.

timelineItems.name: Chris Gluck
timelineItems.text: #PORvCHV #RCTID near post has been open all night on these corners

timelineItems.name: Chris Gluck
timelineItems.text: #PORvCHV #RCTID more speed with zakuani coming on - superb game by Gaston tonite... hard working on both sides of the ball

timelineItems.name: BOG
timelineItems.text: La Gata with a hell of a shift tonight. A pleasure to see him and Valeri working together throughout the midfield. #RCTID #PORvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA).
Liam Ridgewell (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: BJ Clark
timelineItems.text: Terrible technique by Adi on that header. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Aaron A. Smith
timelineItems.text: Timbers Army ready for battle. . . #RCTID http://t.co/9upFqbgl2T

timelineItems.comment: Nathan Sturgis (Chivas USA) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers).
Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Danny O'Rourke.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal. Assisted by Erick Torres.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Donovan Ricketts does well to parry Barrera's shot

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Erick Torres (Chivas USA) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Mauro Rosales with a cross following a corner.
Attempt saved. Leandro Barrera (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Erick Torres.

timelineItems.name: Brent
timelineItems.text: Great job Pap!! now that is a stopper with some tenacity tonight!! #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Donny Toia (Chivas USA) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: BOG
timelineItems.text: 83’ Ricketts does well to keep his clean sheet with a reaction save on a low ball through traffic. #RCTID #PORvCHV

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Barrera just creates out of nothing, Cubo nearly pounced if not for the great hands of Ricketts. #PORvCHV

timelineItems.name: The Show Erik Morgan
timelineItems.text: 80th Minute: You are my sunshine. My only sunshine. You make me happy when times are gray. Don't you please take my sunshine away. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Rodney Wallace (Portland Timbers).
Mauro Rosales (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Chris Gluck
timelineItems.text: #PORvCHV #RCTID Valeri leads with his heart and his skills on the pitch - most valuable player clearly on this team.... wow...

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Chivas USA. Conceded by Will Johnson.
Attempt missed. Ryan Finley (Chivas USA) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Paul Manson
timelineItems.text: Roasted goat! #RCTID http://t.co/TRiihuxmdV

timelineItems.name: Brent
timelineItems.text: quick observations.. Pap needs to NOT wait for a call by the ref. Adi needs to work on more creative movement away from the ball. #RCTID

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Portland Timbers 1, Chivas USA 0. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Diego Valeri makes it 1 nil with a golazo from outside the box

timelineItems.comment: Marvin Chávez (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fanendo Adi (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Maximiliano Urruti (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high. Assisted by Will Johnson.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Maximiliano Urruti with a chance to kill it

timelineItems.desc: Liam Ridgewell (Portland Timbers) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Liam Ridgewell is show a yellow card for a bad foul

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Maximiliano Urruti (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Will Johnson.

timelineItems.name: Cascade Rangers Live
timelineItems.text: #Respect, Timbers Army. You guys really, REALLY brought it tonight. #RCTID #PORvCHV

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Liam Ridgewell (Portland Timbers).
Erick Torres (Chivas USA) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Marianne Dutton
timelineItems.text: #RCTID http://t.co/Mnb9g9W8sn

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marco Delgado (Chivas USA).
Diego Chara (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Caroline Quiring
timelineItems.text: Sweet Win, TimbersFC! #rctid

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Portland Timbers 2, Chivas USA 0.
